title: For as moche as by credyble meanes it hath bene declared to the kynges maiestie, that the frenche kynge omittynge the duetie and office of a good christen prynce (whiche is moche to be lamented) hath not onely by a longe time and season ayded the great Turke, ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)
publisher: Tho. Berthelet regis impressit. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,
notes: Reproductions of the original in the Society of Antiquaries.
